channel.title: Tools_contents on Constraint Systems
channel.description: Recent content in Tools_contents on Constraint Systems

item.title: Tabletop
item.description: View and crop images from your webcam. Download the result.

item.title: Masks
item.description: Collage faces using your webcam.

item.title: Grain
item.description: Progressively pixelate an image.

item.title: Conservation
item.description: An experimental drawing app where the total RGB values are always preserved.

item.title: CSS Paint
item.description: Paint using brushes defined in CSS. An ode to the power of CSS and an experiment in giving people weird building blocks.

item.title: Nest
item.description: An experimental webpage-builder. Add content like a text document. Blocks can be nested to organize and structure. Use custom CSS and classes for layout and style.

item.title: Grid
item.description: An experimental text editor. Adjust the grid size and text direction to create weird and expressive layouts.

item.title: Cascade
item.description: An experiment in collaborative CSS. Style is determined by the most recent 32 posts.

item.title: csOS
item.description: Use the Constraint Systems collection of experimental creative tools all together in one place.

item.title: Mosaic
item.description: Recreate one image using the tiles from another image.

item.title: Collage
item.description: An experimental public collage that combines images according to their complexity.

item.title: Type
item.description: A directed typing experiment. You choose the direction the letters should flow.

item.title: Push
item.description: Push and pull blocks to distort an image.

item.title: Flow
item.description: An experimental image editor that lets you set and direct pixel-flows.

item.title: Fracture
item.description: Shatter and recombine images using a grid of viewports.

item.title: Tri
item.description: Tri is an experimental image distorter. You can choose an image to render using a WebGL quad, adjust the texture and position coordinates to create different distortions, and save the result.

item.title: Tile
item.description: Layout images using a tiling tree layout. Move, split, and resize images using keyboard controls.

item.title: Sift
item.description: Slice an image into multiple layers. You can offset the slices to create interference patterns and pseudo-3D effects.

item.title: Automadraw
item.description: Draw and evolve your drawing using cellular automata on a pixel grid with two keyboard-controlled cursors.

item.title: Span
item.description: Lay out and rearrange text, line by line, using keyboard controls.

item.title: Stamp
item.description: Image-paint from a source image palette using keyboard controls.

item.title: Collapse
item.description: Collapse an image into itself using ranked superpixels.

item.title: Res
item.description: Selectively pixelate an image using a compression algorithm.

item.title: Rgb
item.description: Pixel-paint using keyboard controls.

item.title: Face
item.description: Edit both the text and the font it is rendered in.

item.title: Pal
item.description: Apply an eight-color terminal color scheme to an image. Use the keyboard controls to choose a theme, set thresholds, and cycle hues.

item.title: Bix
item.description: Draw on binary to glitch text.

item.title: Diptych
item.description: Pixel-reflow an image to match the dimensions of your text. Save the result as a diptych.

item.title: Slide
item.description: Divide and slide-stretch an image using keyboard controls.

item.title: Freeconfig
item.description: Push around image pixels in blocks.

item.title: Moire
item.description: Generate angular skyscapes using Asteroids-like ship controls.

item.title: Hex
item.description: A keyboard-driven, grid-based drawing tool.

item.title: Etch
item.description: A keyboard-based pixel drawing tool.
